TopicTitle: Can't believe it made it to orbit.

Articles.Content:
Was never designed to be an atmospheric craft. Now I just need some Vipers...

Only going to post this one, far-away, profile pic because it's ugly as sin from most every angle (including this one)...

![screenshot20.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot20.png)

Ok, fine, here's a couple more hints...

![screenshot22.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot22.png)

![screenshot23.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot23.png)

I gotta say, I'm kind of proud of the Viper, while Craplactica is a pile of...crap...
